Item.name: Empty Rum Bottle
Item.description: An empty rum bottle used for some recipes. Can be thrown or used in water to collect dirty water.

Item.description: An empty Whiskey bottle used for some recipes. Can be thrown or used in water to collect dirty water.

Item.description: An empty Halucinova bottle used for some recipes. Can be thrown or used in water to collect dirty water.

Item.name: Empty Bottle
Item.description: An empty bottle used for some recipes. Can be thrown or used in water to collect dirty water.

Item.name: Empty Jar
Item.description: An empty jar used for some recipes. Can be thrown.

Item.name: Empty Shaker
Item.description: An empty shaker ready to be filled with salt! Can be thrown

Item.name: Empty Cup
Item.description: An empty cup for drinks. Can be thrown or filled with tea.

Item.name: Glass Fragments
Item.description: Shattered glass. Can be obtained through smashing bottles or crafting them from quartz at a fabricator. Used for crafting at a fabricator or bottle printer.

Item.name: Bubble Berry Jam
Item.description: Tasty jam made out of bubble berries. Known to quench a bit of thirst.

Item.name: Pomegrenade Jam
Item.description: Tasty jam made out of pomegrenade. Known to be a bit more filling.
